feed.title: Combined summary - Ramping up with bitcoin core engineering?

entry.title: Combined summary - Ramping up with bitcoin core engineering?
entry.summary: The Bitcoin.org Development Guide has grown significantly this year, providing two useful introductions for those interested in contributing to the development of Bitcoin Core. The first introduction offers an overview of how a developer can contribute, while the second provides an in-depth reference to how the entire system works. To further assist those seeking involvement or information, the Bitcoin Wiki and the #bitcoin-dev room on Freenode are recommended resources.A user named Panos Sakkos expressed interest in contributing to the development of Bitcoin Core by starting with writing unit tests. He asked if there was any documentation available to help him get familiar with the project's tools and infrastructure and offered to assist with test efforts if needed. With the assistance of the Bitcoin.org Development Guide, Panos and other potential contributors have access to valuable resources to aid them in their contributions to Bitcoin Core.
